Description: Flaring ring foot and wall sherd of Corinthian black-glazed pottery kotyle; interior glazed (fired reddish-brown); exterior: from top, four alternating bands of added red and added white; below, rays at base of wall, with red band on outer face of foot; on inner face of foot wide red band; on underside red and black concentric bands; incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 371)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GB.243) (phase 3)
